events.message: I recently received my order but I want to return it and get a full refund because the item does not meet my expectations.
The issue has been classified under the Refund cluster based on the customer's request for money back.
The case has been assigned to support agent Sarah to handle the refund process.
Hello, thank you for reaching out. I'm here to help you with your refund request. Could you please provide your order number?
To proceed with your refund, I need the order ID and the reason you are not satisfied with the product.
My order number is 123456789. The product is not what I expected and I want to return it and get my money back as soon as possible.
Thank you for the information. We will initiate the refund process immediately and provide you with a prepaid shipping label for the return.
Thanks for the quick response! I appreciate the help and will send the item back as per your instructions.
Your returned item was received and the refund has been processed. You should see the amount back in your account within 3-5 business days.
We just wanted to follow up and make sure that your refund was received and that you are satisfied with the resolution.
Since there has been no further response, we are closing this case. Please contact us anytime if you need further assistance.
We have sent a short survey to gather your feedback about your recent refund experience with our customer support.
